snippet: School performance will be the primary factor in determining which Chicago schools to overhaul, but indicators of how well used a school is utilized will also be taken into account.
lead_paragraph: School performance will be the primary factor in determining which Chicago schools to overhaul, but indicators of how well used a school is utilized will also be taken into account.

headline.main: Officials Will Use Complicated Formula to Help Determine Fate of Some Schools
headline.seo: Complicated Formula Will Help Determine Fate of Some Chicago Schools
headline.print_headline: Officials Will Use Complicated Formula to Help Determine Fate of Some Schools
